amendment.description: Senate amendment inserts a complete new text entitled "Veterans Mobility Safety Act" and appears on page H6354 of the Congressional Record of November 29, 2016.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
